Featured Projects

Agentic Self-Healing ETL Pipeline

  • OpenAI GPT-4, SQLite, LangChain, Airflow

I created a system that fixes problems in a data pipeline on its own by using AI to find and fix errors automatically. This system reads logs and changes the code as needed, cutting down the time spent on manual debugging by over 90% during tests.

Check it out

Live Activity Tracker with Threshold-Based Alerts

  • AWS Kinesis, AWS Lambda, AWS DynamoDB

I built a real-time tracking system using AWS Kinesis to stream data, AWS Lambda to process it, and AWS DynamoDB to store the results. I also used AWS S3 to archive the data and QuickSight to create dashboards for visualizing user activity. This system handles over 10,000 user actions per minute and sends alerts every 10 minutes when specific thresholds are crossed.

Check it out

TransLingo: Neural Machine Translation with Seq2Seq

  • NLP, PyTorch, Encoder-Decoder

TransLingo is a neural machine translation project leveraging sequence-to-sequence (Seq2Seq) models with attention mechanisms to translate text from one language to another. Utilizing PyTorch for scalable and efficient training, the project aims to provide accurate translations for language pairs such as German to English.

Check it out

Vision Assistance Technology for the Visually Impaired

  • NLP, PyTorch, Computer Vision

I am developing a computer vision-based project utilizing Apple‚Äôs models designed for Apple Silicon chips such as DETR Resnet50 Semantic Segmentation and Depth Anything V2. This project aims to assist vision-impaired individuals by providing real-time information about their surroundings, helping them navigate and interact with their environment more effectively.

Restaurant Recommendation System

  • Machine Learning, Big Data

Extracted and cleaned data from Yelp, then utilized a distributed storage system for data mining and recommendation. Secured 3rd position among 200 students in a class leaderboard by developing a recommendation system utilizing Spark, Python, Hadoop, SQL, and Java. Achieved an RMSE of 97.42, demonstrating exceptional accuracy and performance. Notably enhanced user experience and engagement, resulting in improved customer satisfaction and retention.

Predicting Agricultural Yield by Integrating Remote Sensing Data and Machine Learning Technology

  • Deep Learning, Neural Networks, Remote Sensing

Developed a machine learning model for predicting crop yield in Punjab using 17 years of weather, soil, and NDVI data. Employed statistical methods, machine learning algorithms, and real-world validation techniques.

Check it out

My Hobby

Exploring the wonders of nature has always been my passion. From the lush forests to the towering mountains and serene coastlines, there's something truly magical about immersing oneself in the beauty of the natural world. Every journey outdoors brings a sense of wonder and excitement, igniting my curiosity and inspiring me to capture the essence of each moment through photography.

Exploring National Parks

  • Landscape Photography, Nature, Adventure

As an avid photographer, I love to capture the beauty of nature through my lens. Whether it's the majestic arches of Bryce Canyon National Park or the serene tranquility of hidden caves, each photograph tells a unique story and allows me to share my passion for exploration and adventure with others.

Exploring Nature through my Lens

  • Trekking, Hiking, Peace

As an enthusiastic photographer, I'm drawn to the captivating landscapes of Page, Arizona. From the surreal beauty of Antelope Canyon to the majestic vistas of Horseshoe Bend, each click of my camera captures the essence of this remarkable place. Additionally, I enjoy trekking through the rugged terrain and hiking along the scenic trails, immersing myself in the natural beauty and adventure of the region.
